word: H2814 - חָשָׁה - châshâh - khaw-shaw' - Hold peace

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - மவுனமாயிரு, அடங்கு, பேசாமலிரு, சும்மா இரு, அமரு
to be silent, to be quiet, to be still, to be inactive
a) (Qal) to be silent, to be still
1) to be silent, to exhibit silence
2) to show inactivity, to be inactive
3) to make silent, to make quiet, to cause to be still
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to hush or keep quiet: - hold peace, keep silence, be silent, (be) still.
